lyrics:
2 contributorsdaydream first sessions outtakes lyricsverse 1
day dream why do you haunt me so
deep in a rosy glow
the face of my love you show
day dream i walk along on air
building a castle there
for me and my love to share

bridge
i dont know the time
oh lord im in such a daze
the sun in the sky
while i moon around feeling hazy

verse 2
day dream dont break my reverie
until i find out that he is day dreaming about me

instrumental break

bridge
i dont know the time
oh lord im in such a daze
the sun in the sky
while i walk around feeling hazy
see norah jones liveget tickets as low as 26you might also likeoutro
day dream dont break my reverie
until i find out that he is day dreaming about me
